options.name: Beginner Abjurist
options.description: You can research Beginner Level Abjuration Spells and gain +1 Power.

options.name: Action : Bond
options.description: You bond to a Creature, increasing the efficiency of your Shield Spells when used on them, adding additional Shielding equal to your Level. You can only be bound to one Creature at a time.

options.name: Shared Voice
options.description: You and your bonded Creature can communicate telepathically when they are within 20 Units of you.

options.name: Reaction : Shared Life
options.description: As a Reaction to recovering Health, your bonded target receives it instead.

options.name: Novice Abjurist
options.description: You can research Novice Level Abjuration Spells, gain +1 Spell Attack and +2 Power.

options.name: Shared Mind
options.description: You and your Bonded Target both gain a 1d4 Bonus to Resistance Checks.

options.name: Perfect Shields
options.description: When you Shield an Ally as a Reaction, any Secondary or Tertiary Damage is also reduced by the total value of the Shield before Mitigation.

options.name: Journeyman Abjurist
options.description: You can research Journeyman Level Abjuration Spells, gain +5 Power and +1 Elemental Mitigation

options.name: Improved Channeling
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Damage and +3 Power Regeneration

options.name: Reaction : Divert Energy
options.description: If the Creature you are bonded to takes Damage, you take the Damage instead applying both yours and your bonded allys Mitigation.

options.name: Expert Abjurist
options.description: You can research Expert Level Abjuration Spells, gain +8 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage

options.name: Contingency
options.description: When you fall Unconscious, you become Impervious for 1 minute or until you regain Consciousness

options.name: Action : Overshield
options.description: You Channel an Abjuration Shield that requires a Reaction as an Action and grant Temporary Health instead of a Shield.

options.name: Master Abjurist
options.description: You can research Master Level Abjuration Spells, gain +10 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Resistance. Additionally, you can research Grand Master Abjuration Spells at level 13.
